attributes.action: Allowing Lapdancing clubs to open that can be made Covid secure
attributes.additional_details:
Apply strict measures such as screens in front of customers and dancers.

Dancers in separate areas and no contact in the bar. Girls always 2 meters apart wearing visors or masks. When dancing behind screens.

Normal Covid measures apply as a normal bar would have.
attributes.background: Lapdancing is a close non contact venue. These can be made Covid secure and allowed to operate as many other business have
